TopicTitle: How do you think Unity 5 will impact ksp?

Articles.Content:
As some of us heard unity five got announced yesterday and it comes with alot more upgrades and improvments. Video>

but what i want to know is how its gonna affect your experience in ksp.

but what i want to know is how its gonna affect your experience in ksp.

It's not going to affect anything about my KSP experience until the devs switch over. We'll probably see some performance improvements, though.
Id like to think they'd make the switch come .25. Which is a bit of a milestone isn't it? Game'll be a quarter complete.

Id like to think they'd make the switch come .25. Which is a bit of a milestone isn't it? Game'll be a quarter complete.

The version numbers are simply increments forward. There will not be a version .9x ... I would venture to guess that .30 or sooner will be the release version.

Please continue discussion in the existing thread in the Development Discussions forum

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72925-Unity-5
